Ok, it looks like this area has become quiet again.  I'll give you 
guys around 48 hours for some old topic to pick up before I decide to 
post 'The Fifty Project' topic.

What is this part about?  How to keep track of scores for the 
tournament and how to decide tie-breakers.  Is there a part 2 to this 
topic?  I don't know yet.
